herocontent: Passionate Junior Front-End Developer with a knack for creating responsive web applications. I sharpen my skills in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.Motivated to learn and grow in a collaborative and dynamic environment, providing creative and effectiv solutions to web development challenges.
aboutText: I am a dedicated and versatile Junior Front-End Developer with a passion for creating efficient and easy-to-use solutions for web applications. I have experience with a variety of technologies, including React, Next.js,  Node.js, SASS, Tailwind, and a nod to MongoDB and Firebase. My journey in web development began with a deep curiosity for how things work and has evolved into a career where I continually strive to learn and adapt to new  challenges, which I have applied to this day in personal projects. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy solving complex problems to deliver high-quality solutions. Outside of programming, I enjoy staying active and exploring new technologies.
